title: Add Course
nameHelperText: The name of the course. Do not include the course codes in this field.
codeHelperText: The course codes that other users can use to find the course. You can add multiple codes by separating them with a comma.
schoolHelperText: The school to which this course belongs.
subjectsHelperText: The subjects to which this course belong. You can choose multiple options.
guidelinesInfo: Please make sure that the course complies with our
